definitions.definition: A cloth-covered frame used for protection against rain or sun .
examples: Quick, grab that umbrella before you get rained on!
The fighters provide a defensive air umbrella over the battle group.

definitions.definition: Anything that provides similar overarching coverage of a range of concepts , purposes , groups , etc.
examples: The test facility was established under the umbrella of the company's quality program.

definitions.definition: A strategy in which five players in the offensive zone form an umbrella-shaped formation around the opposition's goal net.
The main body of a jellyfish , excluding the tentacles .
examples: Jellyfish are composed of more than 90% water and most of their umbrella mass is made up of gelatinous material.

definitions.definition: An umbrella-shaped reflector with a white or silvery inner surface, used to diffuse a nearby light .

main_definition: A cloth-covered frame used for protection against rain or sun .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Anything that provides similar protection .
( figurative ) Anything that provides similar overarching coverage of a range of concepts , purposes , groups , etc.
( ice hockey ) A strategy in which five players in the offensive zone form an umbrella-shaped formation around the opposition's goal net.
The main body of a jellyfish , excluding the tentacles .
( photography , television ) An umbrella-shaped reflector with a white or silvery inner surface, used to diffuse a nearby light .
